summary: This document is a probable cause affidavit from the Palm Beach Police Department detailing the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's unlawful sexual activities with minors. It includes sworn statements from multiple victims and witnesses, describing the nature of the massages provided to Epstein and the sexual acts that occurred during these sessions. The affidavit outlines the evidence collected, including witness testimonies and physical evidence from Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of the investigation, accused of engaging in unlawful sexual activities with minors at his residence.

persons.name: Det Joe Recarey
persons.context: Det. Joe Recarey is the officer who conducted the investigation and documented the sworn statements from victims and witnesses.

persons.name: Jose Alessi
persons.context: Jose Alessi is a former houseman for Epstein who provided information about the massages and the young age of the masseuses.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Alfredo Rodriguez is another former houseman who described the environment in Epstein's home and the nature of the massages.

persons.name: Unnamed Victims
persons.context: Multiple unnamed victims provided sworn statements detailing their experiences with Epstein, including sexual abuse during massages.

connections.description: Jose Alessi was employed by Epstein and had knowledge of the activities occurring in Epstein's residence.
Alfredo Rodriguez worked for Epstein and provided insights into the massages and the age of the girls involved.
Epstein is accused of being the perpetrator of sexual abuse against the unnamed victims during massage sessions.

events.title: Start of Investigation
events.description: The Palm Beach Police Department began a sexual battery investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Witness Interviews
events.description: Detectives interviewed multiple witnesses and victims regarding their experiences with Epstein.

events.title: Search Warrant Executed
events.description: A search warrant was executed at Epstein's residence, revealing evidence of his illegal activities.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is accused of engaging in unlawful sexual activities with minors at his residence.
Victims reported being recruited to provide massages for Epstein, often under the pretense of making money.
The investigation revealed that Epstein had a pattern of sexual abuse during these massage sessions.
Witnesses described the environment in Epstein's home, including the presence of young girls and sexual paraphernalia.
Evidence collected included witness statements, physical evidence from Epstein's residence, and phone records linking Epstein to the victims.
